entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog at times overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Fog at times in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
